1.0.name: wordpress/twitter-trackbacks-bar
1.0.description: Twitter Trackbacks Bar is plugin to integrate tweets that mention your post into your blog. It separates the trackbacks and the pings of comments. Each tweet is comes with reply and retweet's links to get more readers engaged in your conversation's story. This plugin must be installed with Wordpress's plugin Topsy, that integrate your tweets in comments in your blog.
